senses.sense_definition: A person of Greek origin regarded as insignificant or pretentious.

examples.text: The senator dismissed the foreign diplomat as a mere <w>greekling</w> unworthy of the emperor's time.
Critics in the ancient court often mocked him as a <w>greekling</w> to undermine his philosophical arguments.

traits.comment: indicated by the usage in historical contexts and the provided example
